column2: Focus on everything BUT the Baltic Sea.
Expand everywhere EXCEPT towards the Black Sea.

Charcoal is what you get when wood is heated while deprived of oxygen to prevent combustion. While less economically efficient than mining, charcoal-burning provides an alternative coal source for countries lacking mines of their own.

The Haber Process allows the synthetic creation of Nitrate for fertilizer.
The Haber Process allows the synthetic creation of Nitrate for fertilizer.
Option: Enable Strong Railroaded Dual Monarchy

This tweak will make the Dual Monarchy AI make all the right decisions to let them have all of their accepted pops. This doesn't make a player Dual Monarchy strong and just tells the AI which option to pick in the events they receive.
The south african republics are small agrarian states that fight using guerilla warfare, until the region is unified and industrialized, wars will remain being fought on a small scale.
With the Cape Colony under our control we can form a true, united South African republic -- one that at last will keep us from foreign domination and Burgundian rule.
With our extensive rule over the South African territories you can claim the title of Lord Protector of Greater Griqualand.
